issue.title: [R] Fix tests for PartitionNthOptions so that can run on various platforms
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14005](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14005). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The tests for PartitionNthOptions have been written so that the results have to be returned in a specific order, but the results of the compute function are not stable and ordering is not guaranteed, and this has been causing CI failures.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14005?focusedCommentId=17416102) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11162
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11162>
